title: Virtual Reality-Based Karate Skill Learning Curriculum for K-12

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic karate terminology and fundamental movements
context.additional_context: Acquiring karate techniques through VR-based practical training in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can perform karate basic movements (horse stance, front punch, blocking motion) with 80% accuracy in a VR environment
Learners can reproduce three consecutive attack techniques in a real-world environment at least twice through VR simulation.
Learners successfully complete a VR-based karate sparring simulation at least three times in collaboration with peers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
